articles.title: Maxwell pulls off a match-winning catch | Video | Cricket News | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: Rohit and Kohli had added 70 for the second wicket in quick time when Maxwell pulled off a stunning one-handed reflex catch off his own bowling to remove the well-set Indian captain.
articles.content:
Australian all-rounder Glenn Maxwell celebrated his return to international cricket with career-best figures of 4/40 in the third and final ODI against India in Rajkot on Wednesday.
